TEXT.S: Doug Bolstorff nalecuhan i American, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Doug Bolstorff i 1957 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 8 ku uwac atu silsil 57, namapili' tu nu Detroit Pistons putiput. 10 bulad 29 demiad, 1931 a mihca, Doug Bolstorff, miunduay.
